text:
[Verse]
City lights so bright
Stars fill up the night
Walk with me and smile
Stay with me a while

[Verse 2]
Whispers in the air
Wind plays with your hair
Laughter in the breeze
Moments like these please

[Chorus]
Underneath the moon
Hearts are in tune
Dancing in the glow
Never let it go

[Verse 3]
Footsteps on the street
Rhythms soft and sweet
Hand in hand we sway
Lost in this ballet

[Bridge]
Leave the world behind
Love is all we find
Endless like the sky
Together we can fly

[Verse 4]
Silent symphony
Just you and me
Feel the magic start
Heartbeat after heartbeat
title: Moonlight Stroll
